snippet: Christopher S. Murphy, a three-term congressman, won despite heavy spending and an advertising barrage by Linda E. McMahon, the former wrestling executive.
abstract: Connecticut state Congressman Christopher S Murphy defeats former wrestling executive Linda E McMahon to win Senate seat held since 1989 by Joseph I Lieberman, who is retiring; long and bitter race was dominated by media barrage from McMahon, who has spent nearly $100 million on two consecutive bids for Senate.
lead_paragraph: Christopher S. Murphy, a three-term congressman, won despite heavy spending and an advertising barrage by Linda E. McMahon, the former wrestling executive.

headline.seo: Christopher Murphy Defeats Linda McMahon in Connecticut Senate Race
headline.main: Murphy Defeats McMahon After Bitter U.S. Senate Race in Connecticut
headline.print_headline: Murphy Defeats McMahon After Bitter U.S. Senate Race in Connecticut
